description:
Cold Power Regular Advanced Clean, Powder Laundry Detergent, 2kg, Suitable for Front & Top Loaders

Enjoy the visibly clean and brighter whites* laundry experience with Cold Power Advanced Clean. It's unique brightening formula is developed for outstanding results even in Cold Water.
*vs previous Cold Power Liquid Detergent

Cold water washing uses less energy, reduces environmental impact and is gentler to your clothes. Cold Power is the smart choice for your laundry! Choose Cold Power Advanced Clean formula for outstanding brightness in cold water washing.

New Cold Power Advanced Clean formula provides Cold Powers best brightness in cold water washing

Unique brightening formula is specifically developed for outstanding results in cold water

Cold water washing is the smart chocice for your laundry, using less energy and is gentler on your clothes.

Cold Power Advanced Clean powder is also available in Laundry Detergent Liquid

Suitable for Front and Top loader washing machines
name: Cold Power Advanced Clean Laundry Detergent Powder 2Kg
